The Marketers Next Door 008: Snapchat Pre-Mortem

06 Feb 2017
Podcasts The Marketers Next Door

This week on The Marketers Next Door, Marissa and Frank talk Superbowl LI ads and the Snap, Inc. IPO. Could this be the last gasp of a dying startup? Or the most successful IPO in history?
